name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an enhancement for the project
title: '[ENHANCEMENT] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''

---

## Objective
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please provide a clear and concise description of the objective (e.g., I am frustrated when [...]).

## Proposed Solution
Provide a detailed description of the functionality you wish to see implemented.

## Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you have considered.

## Rationale
Why is this feature important to the project? Who does it benefit?

## Additional Context
Add any other context or mockups about the feature request here.
